profile.headline: Network Engineer & System Security Enthusiast
profile.short_bio: A driven Informatics Engineering student with a dual focus on Network Security and Web Development. I actively bridge the gap between theory and practice through rigorous personal projects in system hardening and API development. Currently seeking opportunities to contribute to a dynamic team by delivering secure, high-performance web solutions and robust network architectures.

experiences.title: Network Infrastructure Lead
experiences.description: Memimpin tim IT Club dalam mengelola infrastruktur jaringan kampus. Melakukan konfigurasi router, switch, dan firewall untuk mendukung aktivitas akademis.

experiences.title: System Security Administrator Intern
experiences.description: Melakukan monitoring keamanan sistem, update security patches, dan implementasi security hardening pada server production. Melakukan penetration testing basic untuk mengidentifikasi vulnerability.

experiences.title: Backend Development Project
experiences.description: Mengembangkan REST API untuk aplikasi manajemen inventori menggunakan Django REST Framework. Implementasi authentication, validation, dan database optimization.
